REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A RM f2660 reute r f BC-INTEGRATED-RESOURCES 03-31 0089

TEXT.TITLE: INTEGRATED RESOURCES <IRE> FILES NOTE OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: Integrated Resources Inc said it filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission a registration statement covering 150 mln dlrs of senior notes. The notes are to be sold in three equal-sized issues of 50 mln dlrs. The maturities will be 1990, 1992 and 1994. Proceeds will be used to repay short-term debt incurred primarily for working capital, Integrated Resources said. The company named Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc as sole manager of the offerings. Reuter
